findings.title: Suggested immutable in multiSigWallet For Gas Efficiency
findings.description: The state variable `multiSigWallet` can be defined as `immutable` since it will not be changed after its initialization in the constructor, which can improve gas efficiency.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In `Jungle Road Token` contract, there is a privileged `multiSigWallet` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the token-related operations.
